summary.Title: Wanna Join Our Floor Team?
summary.Presentation: Bye, bye mosquitoes! Serious mini-golf, wrapped in nonsense and fun. In recent years game-based social venues have been on the rise across the globe. They are

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Bye, bye mosquitoes!

Serious mini-golf, wrapped in nonsense and fun.

In recent years game-based social venues have been on the rise across the globe. They are the perfect meeting place for all social happenings: work, a date, or just friends on a night out.

We take mini-golf seriously, and brought  the experience indoors to make it an all  year round activity. At Camping, we combine fun and games with a vibrant bar and club culture. Our courses have good playability but are still fun even for those who play mini-golf for the first time.

Are you outgoing, energetic, and love to create authentic experiences for our guests? Do you have a background in the experience industry business or are you just simply crazy about it?

WE ARE LOOKING FOR NEW STAFF WHO CAN JOIN THE FAMILY AS SOON AS POSSIBLE! LET'S GO CAMPING!
 
The responsibilities
  • Welcoming our guests and ensuring they have the best time
  • Taking and running food and drink orders
  • Clearing tables
  • Mixing cocktails and making drinks
  • Taking payments
  • Assisting in the cleaning and tidying of the Restaurant.
  • Maintain the highest levels of personal hygiene and appearance.
  • Follow the law in respect of food hygiene and health and safety

We are offering
  • Full time or part time position starting as soon as possible
  • Working hours include evenings, weekends and public holidays
  • A friendly, fun enjoyable, unique working environment
  • Social events throughout the year
  • 30% staff discount  for  you   and up to 3  friends at our restaurants and other concepts under  the NoHo  Partners Denmark Umbrella

We want to provide great experiences for our guests - that's why we are looking for the most outgoing and motivated people with a love for parties, sports and activities.

You can read more about our concepts here https://www.camping.bar

We love to promote from within in all areas of our business, therefore the opportunities to grow and develop within Cocks & Cows, or other NoHo  Partners DK concepts is high if that is what you are seeking.  part, then we've got a career path for you - we'd love to be the last company you ever work for!

Please apply by sending a CV and Cover Letter for this role. 
Applications are ongoing and will be reviewed on a regular basis.
